title: Updated Beauty in Oaklawn! Hardwood Floors!
posting_body: If you’re looking for a fabulous location and upscale amenities, this fabulous community has you covered.
We offer one and two bedroom apartments in Dallas, in the conveniently located Oak Lawn neighborhood near Uptown.

Open your door to upgraded features from large windows that let in natural light, improved gourmet island kitchens with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances ideal for any cooking arrangement, built-in shelves for extra style and storage, and a private patio or balcony.
Plus, you can profit from unique community amenities.
Set fitness goals with an upgraded 4,000 square foot 24-hour fitness center, Zen garden, and yoga studio.
You can even relax in a five-star swimming pool, resident lounge, spa, or tanning bed.
And, for those who have pets, this community allows up to 3 per household.
Take them along to enjoy a doggie pool and 2 bark parks.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
